bio: Master's degree from the Federal University of Juiz de Fora since 2019. Always curious about computing, seeking to learn new languages, techniques, and tools.

experience.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
experience.description: Software development in conjunction with the extension of the SYDLE ONE platform, using it as a backend in the backend as a service mode.

experience.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
experience.company: CEAD @ Federal University of Juiz de Fora
experience.description: Development and maintenance of external system software for the registration of selection process notices for students and tutors for courses managed by the Distance Education Center of UFJF, and an internal financial administration system and process monitoring of these notices. Occasional development of Wordpress themes.
list: Software development in Java and PHP.
Creation of Wordpress themes with Materialize and CSS 3.

education.title: BACHELOR'S DEGREE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE
education.institution: DCC @ FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF JUIZ DE FORA
education.description: The Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at the Federal University of Juiz de Fora has computing as its main activity and aims to train professionals with deep technical and scientific foundation in the area, capable of entering professional, academic, and scientific sectors, and contributing to the development of Brazilian society and the advancement of science and technology.
